content: I think these tips are really helpful, especially the one about breaking down the project into smaller tasks. I tend to get overwhelmed when I look at a big project as a whole, but if I can break it down into smaller tasks, it feels more manageable. I also like the idea of using a 'parking lot' for ideas that come up while I'm working on the project. Sometimes I get sidetracked by new ideas, but if I can write them down and come back to them later, it will help me stay focused. Do you have any suggestions for tools or apps that can help with project management and organization?
